posts.title: Socrates
posts.excerpt: Quote:After his mother’s sudden death, Socrates, a 15-year-old living on the margins of São Paulo’s coast, must survive on his own while coming to terms with his grief.

posts._title: Martin Fric – Zivot je pes AKA A Dog’s Life (1933)
posts.title: Zivot je pes
posts.excerpt: Young music composer Viktor Honzl in vain looks for work. He is prevented from committing suicide by a technician of the gasworks who shortly beforehand has disconnected his gas due to past due bills. In the disguise of an older, serious, musical scholar Viktor obtains work in a music publishing house. So he may court …

posts._title: Toshiya Fujita – Imouto aka Younger Sister (1974)
posts.title: Imouto
posts.excerpt: Synopsis (from mnauce@ADC):A Seishun Kayo Eiga (youth film featuring songs), about the “interesting” relationship btw abrother and his younger sister. Actually one entry of a trilogy Toshiya Fujita made at that timewith Kumiko Akiyoshi. Also, One of the top 10 films voted by Jumpo that year. One of the only few non-Roman Porno Nikkatsu films …

posts._title: Aki Kaurismäki – Tulitikkutehtaan tyttö aka The Match Factory Girl (1990)
posts.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tyttö
posts.excerpt: Quote:A woman’s terribly dull life is upended by a one-night stand pregnancy, causing her to seek retribution.

posts._title: Ki-duk Kim – Seom AKA The Isle [+commentary] (2000)
posts.title: Seom
posts.excerpt: Quote:An artistic, shocking love story that disturbed audiences and confused almost all critics that couldn’t see beyond the disturbing images. A mute girl maintains a fishing resort where people stay in floating mini-houses while fishing, resting and using prostitutes. She services them in any way she can in order to make ends meet but the …

posts.title: The Chase
posts.excerpt: Quote:Preceding Bonnie and Clyde by a year, Arthur Penn’s (Mickey One) acclaimed film boasts enviable pedigree – produced by the legendary Sam Spiegel, with a screenplay by Lillian Hellman from the novel by Horton Foote, a rousing score by John Barry, and a stellar cast of the hottest stars of the day (including Marlon Brando, …

posts._title: Petra Costa – Democracia em Vertigem AKA The Edge of Democracy (2019) (HD)
posts.title: Democracia em Vertigem
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:A cautionary tale for these times of democracy in crisis, the personal and political fuse in The Edge of Democracy to explore one of the most dramatic periods in Brazilian history. Combining unprecedented access to Presidents Lula da Silva and Dilma Rousseff with accounts of her own family’s complex political and industrial past, filmmaker Petra …

posts._title: Marie Monge – Joueurs AKA Treat Me Like Fire (2018)
posts.title: Joueurs
posts.excerpt: When Ella meets Abel, her life changes. In the wake of this elusive lover, the girl will discover the cosmopolitan Paris and underground gaming circles, where adrenaline and money reign. First a bet, their story is transformed into a devouring passion.

posts.title: California
posts.excerpt: Quote:“Wicked” Lily Bishop joins a wagon train to California, led by Michael Fabian and Johnny Trumbo, but news of the Gold Rush scatters the train. When Johnny and Michael finally arrive, Lily is rich from her saloon and storekeeper (former slaver) Pharaoh Coffin is bleeding the miners dry. But worse troubles are ahead: California is …

posts._title: Nadezhda Kosheverova – Staraya, staraya skazka AKA A Very Old Story (1968)
posts.title: Staraya, staraya skazka
posts.excerpt: A young puppeteer tells a story about a soldier who falls in love with a rude princess. Based on fairy tales by Hans Christian Andersen.
